subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Mets’ moves this off-season have done little to make the roster younger. The latest deal was the signing of Damion Easley, a 37-year-old utility infielder, to a one-year, $850,000 contract Thursday.
snippet: The Mets’ moves this off-season have done little to make the roster younger. The latest deal was the signing of Damion Easley, a 37-year-old utility infielder, to a one-year, $850,000 contract Thursday.
